name: Leaf Dive
description:
===== Leaf Dive =====
Dive into autumn with Leaf Dive! As a fallen leaf, dodge spiky obstacles in a body of water in classic mode or just enjoy the swim in playground mode!

===== How to Play =====
- Drag the mouse/your finger to move the leaf.
- In classic mode, avoid the spiky obstacles. Touching one will make you lose a life. Lose 3 lives, and it's game over.
- The wind will blow you and some other objects in the direction it is going. The wind automatically changes in classic mode, but it is controlled by the player in playground mode.
- In playground mode, use the slider below to change the wind speed/direction.
